bgibbons.game.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.entities.Entity
      • bgibbons.game.entities.Mob
        • bgibbons.game.entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends Mob
    An extension of the Mob class for a player.

      • Player

        public Player(Level level,
              int x,
              int y,
              InputHandler input)
        Constructor the Player object.
        Parameters:
        level - Level for the player to be added to.
        x - The x coordinate the player will start at.
        y - The y coordinate the player will start at.
        input - The InputHandler used to control the player.
